diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+#pragma once
+
+#include "ATen/core/Scalar.h"
+#include "ATen/Tensor.h"
+
+namespace at {
+
+// FIXME: this should be (and was) Scalar::toTensor, but there is currently no way
body: Based on the discussion we had in the meeting today, it seems likely that eventually, there will be *some* way in ATen/core to allocate a vanilla CPU tensor. So when that happens, we can put this back in Core.
body_html: Based on the discussion we had in the meeting today, it seems likely that eventually, there will be some way in ATen/core to allocate a vanilla CPU tensor. So when that happens, we can put this back in Core.
body_text: Based on the discussion we had in the meeting today, it seems likely that eventually, there will be some way in ATen/core to allocate a vanilla CPU tensor. So when that happens, we can put this back in Core.
